metadata.title: CVE-2024-6714 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in provd before version 0.1.5 with a setuid binary,which allows a local attacker to escalate their privilege.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-6714` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

provd - 0.1.2+24.04
No subscription required

criterions.comment: provd package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.1.2+24.04').
